comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of top-loading machines
- y: number of front-loading machines

Extracted Constraints:
- Items Constraint: 50x + 75y \geq 5000
- Energy Constraint: 85x + 100y \leq 7000
- Top-loading Limit: x \leq 0.4(x+y)
- Front-loading Minimum: y \geq 10
- Non-negativity: x, y \geq 0

Extracted Objective:
- Minimize the total number of washing machines: Minimize x + y
